ingredients.item: 1 Waitrose Duchy Organic Brown Onion, chopped
300g pack Waitrose Duchy Organic 20 Free Range British Pork Meatballs
250g pack Waitrose Duchy Organic Chestnut Mushrooms, sliced
470g jar Seeds Of Change Organic White Pasta Sauce
2 tbsp Saclaâ€™ Organic Vegetarian Pesto No. 5 Basil
1 tbsp Waitrose Duchy Organic Wholegrain Mustard With Honey

instructions.step: Cook the spaghetti in boiling water for 10 minutes then drain.

Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the onion, meatballs and mushrooms for 5 minutes. Stir in the white sauce, pesto and mustard, cover and simmer for 5-6 minutes or until the meatballs are cooked throughout with
Stir in the parsley and toss into the spaghetti.
